string-array.name: game_results_tips
string-array.item: make sequences of more than 2 fast answers (< than 3 sec.) to multiply the round score by 2.
a clean game (one without a single wrong answer) multiplies your score by 1.5. Don\'t rush, play clean!
make use of the time while the metronome is ticking to quickly scan through answers so you can guess faster.
answering within first 3, 5 or 10 sec. gives you extra points, however for each wrong answer you will get twice as less score in the current round.
